antiCensorship.title: Censorship Protection
antiCensorship.description: Decentralized storage based on blockchain technology ensures your creative content cannot be arbitrarily deleted or censored, truly guaranteeing creative freedom.

originalAttribution.title: Original Attribution System
originalAttribution.description: Users can declare their works as original when uploading posts. The post will be bound to a CHIPS proof with a unique ID recorded immutably on the blockchain for others to verify.

chips.title: CHIPS Proof System
chips.description: A blockchain-based original work certification system that provides immutable ownership proof for every original content

step1.title: Claim Original
step1.description: Users can choose to declare their work as original when posting, and the system will generate a unique CHIPS proof for that work

step2.title: Blockchain Record
step2.description: The unique ID and related information of the CHIPS proof are permanently recorded on the blockchain, ensuring data immutability

step3.title: Public Verification
step3.description: Anyone can view and verify CHIPS proofs, ensuring transparency and credibility of original works

antiCounterfeit.title: Anti-Counterfeit Protection
antiCounterfeit.description: Blockchain technology ensures proofs cannot be forged or tampered with

uniqueId.title: Unique Identifier
uniqueId.description: Each proof has a unique ID for easy tracking and verification

transparency.title: Public Transparency
transparency.description: Everyone can view and verify the authenticity of proofs

permanentStorage.title: Permanent Storage
permanentStorage.description: Proof information is permanently stored and will not be lost or damaged
